channel.title: Easy desktop cleanup! NO DL
channel.description:
Step 1 Open my documents Step 2 Click create a new folder. Rename it as desktop Step 3 Right click and then click on send to ... Click desktop (create shortcut) Step 4 Now, drag the icons from your desktop into it.
Tips. After creating a shortcut of the folder rename it again so it doesnt say "shortcut to"
Tip from daviddude36 : right click the desktop, click arrange icons and then unselect "Show desktop items"

item.title: Easy desktop cleanup! NO DL

item.title: Easy desktop cleanup! NO DL
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Another goot tip, which i think you should add is simply right click the desktop, click arrange icons and then unselect “Show desktop items”

It feels good to have a clear desktop.

Read full topic

Step 4
